AsyncTrigger.cached

機能/意味
Whether to cache events
タイプ
AsyncTriggerクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Indicates whether to cache events. You can also set a value.
　If set to true, only one firing will occur regardless of how many times the AsyncTrigger.trigger method is called before firing.
　If false is specified, the shots will be fired the number of times called before firing.
